mesquite.lib.characters

Interface AdjustableDistribution

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CharacterStatesHolder, Listable, Renamable, WithStringDetails
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CharacterHistory, SlicedCharacterHistory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoricalAdjustable, CategoricalHistory, ContinuousAdjustable, ContinuousHistory, DNACharacterAdjustable, DNACharacterHistory, GeographicAdjustable, MeristicAdjustable, MeristicHistory, ProteinAdjustable, ProteinCharacterHistory, RNACharacterAdjustable, RNACharacterHistory

    public interface AdjustableDistribution
extends CharacterStatesHolder
    An interface to signal that a CharacterDistribution can be changed (i.e. its states set, its parent data set, the number of taxa readjusted, and so on. Classes that implement this should override setParentData and setParentCharacter to avoid their use, as AdjustableDistributions should not be dependent on a parent CharacterData. Some CharacterDistributions, such as those that report characters from stored matrices in a CharacterData object, are not adjustable. See general discussion of character storage classes under CharacterState
